TableView.name: VIEW_SMP7_EXPORTACAO_ANATEL
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
WITH dados_x_codigos AS
(SELECT c.DATA,
c.HORA,
c.PMM,
c.CN,
c.BILHETADOR_ORIGINAL,
c.MSC,
c.OK1_DRP,
c.OK1_DRP_TCT,
c.OKT,
c.OK_ITCP,
c.CODIGO
FROM VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP7 c,
VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP7 v
WHERE v.CN = c.CN
AND v.MSC = c.MSC
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(c.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = v.PERIODO
AND v.STATUS = 'T'
),
codigos_sem_dados AS
(SELECT DISTINCT codigo.MSC,
codigo.CN
FROM MSC_CN_CODIGO codigo,
(SELECT DISTINCT BILHETADOR.nome
FROM indicador,
TIPO_TECNOLOGIA,
TECNOLOGIA,
BILHETADOR
WHERE TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = indicador.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA
AND TIPO_TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA
AND TECNOLOGIA.ID = BILHETADOR.ID_TECNOLOGIA
AND indicador.nome IN ('SMP3', 'SMP4', 'SMP5', 'SMP7')
) bilhetador
WHERE codigo.MSC = bilhetador.nome
MINUS
SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.MSC,
TO_CHAR(dados_x_codigos.CN)
FROM dados_x_codigos
),
distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm AS
(SELECT *
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(dados_x_codigos.DATA) AS data FROM dados_x_codigos
) datas,
(SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.MSC,
TO_CHAR(dados_x_codigos.CN) cn
FROM dados_x_codigos
) msc,
(SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.PMM FROM dados_x_codigos
) pmm
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT data,
MSC,
TO_CHAR(CN) cn
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT data,
codigos_sem_dados.MSC,
codigos_sem_dados.CN
FROM codigos_sem_dados,
(SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(dados_x_codigos.DATA) AS data FROM dados_x_codigos
)
)
) msc,
(SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.PMM FROM dados_x_codigos
) pmm
),
dados_trabalhados AS
(SELECT d.data,
d.PMM,
d.cn,
d.MSC,
NVL(p.OK1_DRP, 0) ok1_drp,
NVL(p.OK1_DRP_TCT, 0) ok1_drp_tct,
NVL(p.OKT, 0) okt,
NVL(p.OK_ITCP, 0) ok_itcp,
NVL(
(SELECT b.CODIGO
FROM
(SELECT *
FROM MSC_CN_CODIGO b
ORDER BY cnAtivo.MSC,
cnAtivo.CN,
ultima_atualizacao
) b
WHERE d.MSC = b.MSC
AND d.cn = b.CN
AND TRUNC(d.data, 'MM') >= TRUNC(b.ultima_atualizacao, 'MM')
AND ROWNUM = 1
), 'NID') AS codigo
FROM distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm d,
dados_x_codigos p,
VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP7 cnAtivo
WHERE d.MSC = p.MSC(+)
AND d.cn = p.CN(+)
AND d.PMM = p.PMM(+)
AND TRUNC(d.data) = TRUNC(p.DATA(+))
AND cnAtivo.MSC = d.MSC
AND cnAtivo.CN = d.cn
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(cnAtivo.PERIODO, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = to_date(TO_CHAR(d.data, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy')
AND cnAtivo.STATUS = 'T'
),
dados_smp7 AS
(SELECT *
FROM
(SELECT 'SMP7' AS SMP,
TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy') AS DDX,
NULL AS CONSOLIDACAO,
DECODE(c.codigo, NULL, 'NID', c.codigo) AS PRIMARIA,
DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '032', '057') AS PONDERACAO,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(OKT, 0) - NVL(OK_ITCP, 0))), '-') AS val_ponderacao,
DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '01', '02') AS COLETA,
'' AS indice_14,
'' AS val_indice_14,
'' AS indice_15,
'' AS val_indice_15,
'' AS indice_17,
'' AS val_indice_17,
'' AS indice_18,
'' AS val_indice_18,
'' AS indice_19,
'' AS val_indice_19,
'' AS indice_20,
'' AS val_indice_20,
'' AS indice_22,
'' AS val_indice_22,
'' AS indice_23,
'' AS val_indice_23,
'' AS indice_24,
'' AS val_indice_24,
'' AS indice_25,
'' AS val_indice_25,
'' AS indice_27,
'' AS val_indice_27,
'' AS indice_28,
'' AS val_indice_28,
'30' AS indice_30,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(OK1_DRP, 0) + NVL(OK1_DRP_TCT, 0))), '-') AS val_indice_30,
'31' AS indice_31,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(OKT, 0) - NVL(OK_ITCP, 0))), '-') AS val_indice_31,
'' AS indice_33,
'' AS val_indice_33,
'' AS indice_34,
'' AS val_indice_34,
'' AS indice_36,
'' AS val_indice_36,
'' AS indice_37,
'' AS val_indice_37
FROM dados_trabalhados c,
ddx ddx,
PMM pmm
WHERE TO_CHAR(c.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy')
AND pmm.NOME = c.PMM
GROUP BY 'SMP7',
TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy'),
NULL,
c.codigo,
pmm.NOME
ORDER BY PRIMARIA
)
WHERE PRIMARIA != 'NID'
)
SELECT dados_smp7.SMP,
dados_smp7.DDX,
dados_smp7.CONSOLIDACAO,
dados_smp7.PRIMARIA,
dados_smp7.PONDERACAO,
dados_smp7.val_ponderacao,
dados_smp7.COLETA,
dados_smp7.indice_14,
dados_smp7.val_indice_14,
dados_smp7.indice_15,
dados_smp7.val_indice_15,
dados_smp7.indice_17,
dados_smp7.val_indice_17,
dados_smp7.indice_18,
dados_smp7.val_indice_18,
dados_smp7.indice_19,
dados_smp7.val_indice_19,
dados_smp7.indice_20,
dados_smp7.val_indice_20,
dados_smp7.indice_22,
dados_smp7.val_indice_22,
dados_smp7.indice_23,
dados_smp7.val_indice_23,
dados_smp7.indice_24,
dados_smp7.val_indice_24,
dados_smp7.indice_25,
dados_smp7.val_indice_25,
dados_smp7.indice_27,
dados_smp7.val_indice_27,
dados_smp7.indice_28,
dados_smp7.val_indice_28,
dados_smp7.indice_30,
dados_smp7.val_indice_30,
dados_smp7.indice_31,
dados_smp7.val_indice_31,
dados_smp7.indice_33,
dados_smp7.val_indice_33,
dados_smp7.indice_34,
dados_smp7.val_indice_34,
dados_smp7.indice_36,
dados_smp7.val_indice_36,
dados_smp7.indice_37,
dados_smp7.val_indice_37
FROM dados_smp7
TableView.layoutSQL: With dados_x_codigos As (Select c.DATA, c.HORA, c.PMM, c.CN, c.BILHETADOR_ORIGINAL, c.MSC, c.OK1_DRP, c.OK1_DRP_TCT, c.OKT, c.OK_ITCP, c.CODIGO From VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP7 c, VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP7 v Where v.CN = c.CN And v.MSC = c.MSC And to_date(TO_CHAR(c.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = v.PERIODO And v.STATUS = 'T'), codigos_sem_dados As (Select Distinct codigo.MSC, codigo.CN From MSC_CN_CODIGO codigo, (Select Distinct BILHETADOR.nome From indicador, TIPO_TECNOLOGIA, TECNOLOGIA, BILHETADOR Where TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = indicador.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA And TIPO_TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA And TECNOLOGIA.ID = BILHETADOR.ID_TECNOLOGIA And indicador.nome In ('SMP3', 'SMP4', 'SMP5', 'SMP7')) bilhetador Where codigo.MSC = bilhetador.nome Minus Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.MSC, to_char(dados_x_codigos.CN) From dados_x_codigos), distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm As (Select * From (Select Distinct trunc(dados_x_codigos.DATA) As data From dados_x_codigos) datas, (Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.MSC, to_char(dados_x_codigos.CN) cn From dados_x_codigos) msc, (Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.PMM From dados_x_codigos) pmm Union All Select * From (Select Distinct data, MSC, to_char(CN) cn From (Select Distinct data, codigos_sem_dados.MSC, codigos_sem_dados.CN From codigos_sem_dados, (Select Distinct trunc(dados_x_codigos.DATA) As data From dados_x_codigos))) msc, (Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.PMM From dados_x_codigos) pmm), dados_trabalhados As (Select d.data, d.PMM, d.cn, d.MSC, nvl(p.OK1_DRP, 0) ok1_drp, nvl(p.OK1_DRP_TCT, 0) ok1_drp_tct, nvl(p.OKT, 0) okt, nvl(p.OK_ITCP, 0) ok_itcp, nvl((Select b.CODIGO From (Select * From MSC_CN_CODIGO b Order By cnAtivo.MSC, cnAtivo.CN, ultima_atualizacao) b Where d.MSC = b.MSC And d.cn = b.CN And trunc(d.data, 'MM') >= trunc(b.ultima_atualizacao, 'MM') And RowNum = 1), 'NID') As codigo From distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm d, dados_x_codigos p, VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP7 cnAtivo Where d.MSC = p.MSC(+) And d.cn = p.CN(+) And d.PMM = p.PMM(+) And trunc(d.data) = trunc(p.DATA(+)) And cnAtivo.MSC = d.MSC And cnAtivo.CN = d.cn And to_date(to_char(cnAtivo.PERIODO, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = to_date(to_char(d.data, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') And cnAtivo.STATUS = 'T'), dados_smp7 As (Select * From (Select 'SMP7' As SMP, TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy') As DDX, Null As CONSOLIDACAO, DECODE(c.codigo, Null, 'NID', c.codigo) As PRIMARIA, DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '032', '057') As PONDERACAO, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(OKT, 0) - NVL(OK_ITCP, 0))), '-') As val_ponderacao, DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '01', '02') As COLETA, '' As indice_14, '' As val_indice_14, '' As indice_15, '' As val_indice_15, '' As indice_17, '' As val_indice_17, '' As indice_18, '' As val_indice_18, '' As indice_19, '' As val_indice_19, '' As indice_20, '' As val_indice_20, '' As indice_22, '' As val_indice_22, '' As indice_23, '' As val_indice_23, '' As indice_24, '' As val_indice_24, '' As indice_25, '' As val_indice_25, '' As indice_27, '' As val_indice_27, '' As indice_28, '' As val_indice_28, '30' As indice_30, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(OK1_DRP, 0) + NVL(OK1_DRP_TCT, 0))), '-') As val_indice_30, '31' As indice_31, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(OKT, 0) - NVL(OK_ITCP, 0))), '-') As val_indice_31, '' As indice_33, '' As val_indice_33, '' As indice_34, '' As val_indice_34, '' As indice_36, '' As val_indice_36, '' As indice_37, '' As val_indice_37 From dados_trabalhados c, ddx ddx, PMM pmm Where TO_CHAR(c.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') And pmm.NOME = c.PMM Group By 'SMP7', TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy'), Null, c.codigo, pmm.NOME Order By PRIMARIA) Where PRIMARIA != 'NID') Select dados_smp7.SMP, dados_smp7.DDX, dados_smp7.CONSOLIDACAO, dados_smp7.PRIMARIA, dados_smp7.PONDERACAO, dados_smp7.val_ponderacao, dados_smp7.COLETA, dados_smp7.indice_14, dados_smp7.val_indice_14, dados_smp7.indice_15, dados_smp7.val_indice_15, dados_smp7.indice_17, dados_smp7.val_indice_17, dados_smp7.indice_18, dados_smp7.val_indice_18, dados_smp7.indice_19, dados_smp7.val_indice_19, dados_smp7.indice_20, dados_smp7.val_indice_20, dados_smp7.indice_22, dados_smp7.val_indice_22, dados_smp7.indice_23, dados_smp7.val_indice_23, dados_smp7.indice_24, dados_smp7.val_indice_24, dados_smp7.indice_25, dados_smp7.val_indice_25, dados_smp7.indice_27, dados_smp7.val_indice_27, dados_smp7.indice_28, dados_smp7.val_indice_28, dados_smp7.indice_30, dados_smp7.val_indice_30, dados_smp7.indice_31, dados_smp7.val_indice_31, dados_smp7.indice_33, dados_smp7.val_indice_33, dados_smp7.indice_34, dados_smp7.val_indice_34, dados_smp7.indice_36, dados_smp7.val_indice_36, dados_smp7.indice_37, dados_smp7.val_indice_37 From dados_smp7
